Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business.`` We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services,'' said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. . Back in October, The Blaze reported that Indiana Republican Congressman Mike Pence was considering stepping down from his post as House Republican Chairman in order to run for president in 2012. Similarly, Politico wrote, Mike Pence , a darling of the conservative movement, would leave the leadership job with a blunt explanation to colleagues that he can't commit to a two-year term in House leadership, a source familiar with his deliberations. Mike Pence was the winner of a presidential straw poll at the Values Voter Summit in Washington, D.C. Mike Pence edged out Mike Huckabee , former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney , former House Speaker Newt Gingrich , and Sarah Palin .
